physDesc.additional: Script: 'bru tsha. Lines per folio: 8; 2 on fol. 43b (plus a line with six double shad) Folio numbering in letters on the recto from fol. 2a. Volume letter: Kha (the manuscript was part of a 3-fold bundle containing also (ID:5875) and presumably (ID:7280)) Orthography: - Palatalization of m (e.g., myi, myed) - Particle pa/ba takes the form pa after final –ng and ba after final –n - Particle tu/du takes the form du after final -b (e.g., rab du) - Superabundant 'a rjes 'jug (e.g., dge', rgya mtsho') - Variant spelling (e.g., phun sum 'tshogs, the tsom, log rtogs) Incipit (from "bla ma dam pa") originally written in colored ink (apart from the vowels and shad) appears faded on the black and white reproduction. Lemmata highlighted with color. Some interlinear and marginal notes.
